original_text: If they did not arrive in three days, they would lose everything that belonged to them. They would no longer be part of the Israelite people. That is what the leaders and officers had decided should happen.
korean_text: 누구든지 방백들과 장로들의 훈시를 따라 삼일 내에 오지 아니하면 그의 재산을 적몰하고 사로잡혔던 자의 모임에서 쫓아내리라 하매

sentences.original_text: If they did not arrive in three days
They would no longer be part
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 더 이상 일부가 되지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: That is what the leaders and officers had decided
